lines.text: My dear Nikolas, perhaps you don't realize that it's tea that has made the British Empire and Dr. Watson what they are today.
Well, if one isn't willing to pay the penalty, one shouldn't play the game.
Brooklyn? Well, I knew a most charming man who lived there once. Uh he's now a resident in Sing Sing Prison.
So, the old girl has lost her emeralds, eh?
[kisses Sherlock Holmes on the cheek and walks away]
Elementary my dear Watson; and very pleasant.
I don't understand, Holmes! She seems such a nice girl! She sings charmingly!
My dear fellow, musical talent is hardly evidence of innocence. Moriarity was a virtuoso on the bassoon.
